Subject: License and Support Details for server ID CUJ79UHC
Description:
Dear Support,

We have purchased your company product i.e., DLP Cososys Endpoint Protector. Please confirm the support and license details of our server ID “CUJ79UHC”

Regards,
Sonu Chauhan
What_We_Know__c:
7 May

- The license for server ID CUJ79UHC currently covers 146 Windows devices (with Device Control and Content Aware Protection) and 4 Terminal Server devices.
- The customer’s license and support are set to expire on 1st June 2026, pending confirmation of the contract type.
- There is a possibility that the customer has a 3-year agreement with annual payments through a local partner, which may affect the renewal process.
- Customer Success (Alexandra Bolfa) is handling the case and has requested confirmation of the contract details to provide a final answer.
Next_Steps__c:
7 May

1. Customer to confirm whether they have a 3-year deal with annual payment through their local partner.
2. Customer Success to provide final confirmation of the license expiration and renewal process once contract details are clarified.
3. Support to close the ticket once the customer’s questions are fully answered.
Solution_Comment__c: Ticket closed as per confirmation that they took over.
